pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complexity Measures for Classification Problems // Provides measures to characterize the complexity of classification problems based on the ambiguity and the separation between the classes and the data sparsity and dimensionality of the datasets. This package provides bug fixes, generalizations and implementations of many state of the art measures. The measures are described in the paper: Tin Ho and Mitra Basu (2002) doi:10.1109/34.990132.
